            <entry>cahi1:data_1014be5844717c221b5d2ca206dba28104672758</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Needs and wants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benötigt und wünscht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">A besoin et veut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Necessita e quer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ha bisogno di e desidera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρειάζεται και θέλει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Necesita y desea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations that differentiate between needs and wants. This illustration shows a girl needing food.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">needs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sustainable development</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wants</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
zwischen Notwendigkeiten unterscheiden und wünscht. Diese 
Abbildung zeigt ein Mädchen, das Nahrung benötigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations qui 
différencient entre les besoins et veut. Cette illustration 
montre une fille ayant besoin de nourriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que se 
diferenciam entre necessidades e quer. Esta ilustração mostra 
uma menina que necessita o alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
differenziano fra i bisogni e desidera. Questa illustrazione 
mostra una ragazza che ha bisogno dell'alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που διαφοροποιούν μεταξύ των
αναγκών και θέλουν. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα 
κορίτσι που χρειάζεται τα τρόφιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
distingan entre las necesidades y desea. Esta ilustración 
muestra a muchacha que necesita el alimento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Notwendigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stützbare Entwicklung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wünscht</string>
          </keyword>
